snippet: The company said that Jan Fields, president of McDonald’s USA, would be succeeded by Jeff Stratton, a shakeup the company hopes will jump-start sales and fight off competition.
abstract: McDonald's Corporation announces that Jan Fields, president of McDonald's USA, will be succeeded by Jeff Stratton in December; decision follows the company's first monthly sales drop in nearly a decade.
lead_paragraph: The company said that Jan Fields, president of McDonald’s USA, would be succeeded by Jeff Stratton, a shakeup the company hopes will jump-start sales and fight off competition.
